title: The Soldier's Dream of Capital
theme: A superfluous army marches toward the capital, carrying dreams of glory. Through pits and mountains they learn to enjoy the journey itself, until the capital appears — cool, scenic, exactly as the old songs described. The dream was the journey; the capital was just where it ended.
narrative_arc: Superfluous army → Profound thoughts → Army moves → Radiance catches → Carrying dreams → Crown imagined → Dream sustained → Pits crossed → Tall mountains → Enjoyment learned → Boots ripe → Pavilion rest → Shining faces → Capital appears → Cool descent → Scenery perfect → At once together → Circumference walked → Week to circle → Soldiers counted → Lucky chosen → Buying supplies → Selling begins
narrative_story: They were superfluous — an army that no war required. Their thoughts were profound — sinking deeper than their footsteps. The army moved as one, their armor catching radiance. Each soldier had something to carry — a dream, a promise, a reason. They imagined the crown that awaited their general. This was their dream — to witness triumph. They crossed pits and valleys without complaint. The tall mountains did not stop them. They learned to enjoy the journey itself. Their boots became ripe with dust and memory. At each pavilion they rested, their faces shining. Finally: the capital appeared on the horizon. The air grew cool as they descended into the valley. The scenery was exactly as the old songs described. They would arrive at once — together, as brothers. The circumference of the city walls took a week to walk. Every soldier was counted. Every name recorded. The lucky ones would be presented to the Emperor. They could finally buy supplies — real food, clean clothes. Street vendors rushed to sell them everything. The dream was the journey. The capital was just where it ended.

characters.mnemonic_image: A cover over something small - more protection than needed
characters.story: They are SUPERFLUOUS — an army that no war requires. I GROAN 'Rongg...' — the weight of being unnecessary. The cover protects what doesn't need protecting. Extra soldiers with nowhere to fight.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural weight of being unnecessary
characters.narrative_position: The beginning — an army without purpose

characters.mnemonic_image: Water sinking deep - thoughts going beneath surface
characters.story: Their thoughts are PROFOUND — sinking deeper than their footsteps. I GASP 'CHEN?!' — how deep do these thoughts go? Water sinks beneath the surface, carrying meaning down where feet cannot follow.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising wonder at depth of thought

characters.mnemonic_image: Carts covered for war - military formation moving
characters.story: The ARMY moves as one. I SING 'JUUUN...' — sustained like marching cadence. Covered carts roll together, soldiers in formation. The military machine advances, unified, relentless.
characters.narrative_position: The formation — army moves as one

characters.mnemonic_image: Light catching on a car - armor gleaming
characters.story: Their armor catches RADIANCE. I SING 'HUIII...' — sustained gleaming. Light meets the car of war, reflecting brilliance. The army shines as it moves, a river of reflected sun.

characters.mnemonic_image: An army walking forward - bearing burdens together
characters.story: Each soldier has something TO CARRY — a dream, a promise, a reason. 'YUN!' the burden COMMANDS acceptance. The walking army bears what cannot be seen. Every soldier carries something heavier than armor.

characters.mnemonic_image: A cover over the origin with measure - the headpiece of authority
characters.story: They imagine the CROWN that awaits their general. I SING 'GWAAAAN...' — sustained vision of glory. The cover of authority, measured inch by inch, placed on the head of the worthy. This is what they march toward.

characters.mnemonic_image: Grass and nets covering evening - visions in sleep
characters.story: This is their DREAM — to witness triumph. 'MENG!' the vision COMMANDS belief. Grass and nets cover the evening, and in sleep, impossible things become possible. They dream of glory.

characters.mnemonic_image: Earth that is paradoxically high - holes in the road
characters.story: They cross PITS and valleys without complaint. I SING 'KEEEENG...' — sustained as they leap. Earth rises and falls, creating traps for the unwary. But these soldiers know how to navigate holes.
characters.narrative_position: The obstacles — pits don't stop them

characters.mnemonic_image: A tall pavilion - structure reaching skyward
characters.story: The TALL mountains do not stop them. I SING 'GAOOO...' — sustained as they climb. The structure rises, layer upon layer, reaching toward sky. Mountains are just taller obstacles.

characters.mnemonic_image: A roof over mouth and child - pleasure shared
characters.story: They learn TO ENJOY the journey itself. I GROAN 'Shyangg...' — the heavy realization of pleasure found. Under shelter, with mouths fed and children safe, one can finally enjoy. The journey becomes the reward.

characters.mnemonic_image: Enjoyment over fire - cooked to perfection
characters.story: Their boots become RIPE with dust and memory. I GASP 'SHU?!' — have we come so far? Enjoyment over fire — what was raw becomes cooked, what was new becomes seasoned. The journey ripens them.
characters.narrative_position: The seasoning — boots tell the story

characters.mnemonic_image: A roof over mouth and nail - a rest stop fixed in place
characters.story: At each PAVILION they rest. I GASP 'TING?!' — is there shelter here? The roof covers the speaking-place, fixed by the nail. A place to pause, to recover, to prepare for more.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising relief at rest stop

characters.mnemonic_image: Height and mouth and table - brightness revealed
characters.story: Their faces are SHINING. 'LIANG!' the brightness COMMANDS notice. High above the mouth and table, light reveals joy. After rest, the soldiers' faces glow with renewed purpose.

characters.mnemonic_image: A high gate over mouth - the great city entrance
characters.story: Finally: the CAPITAL appears on the horizon. I SING 'JIIING...' — sustained awe. The high gate over the small speaks power — this is where all roads lead, where dreams culminate.

characters.mnemonic_image: Water at the capital - refreshing descent
characters.story: The air grows COOL as they descend into the valley. I GASP 'LIANG?!' — is this relief? Water meets the capital — the heat breaks, the sweat dries. Refreshment at journey's end.
characters.narrative_position: The relief — air cools at descent

characters.mnemonic_image: Sun over the capital - view that matches the songs
characters.story: The SCENERY is exactly as the old songs described. I GROAN 'Jinggg...' — the weight of beauty recognized. Sun illuminates the capital, and what they see matches what they heard. The songs were true.

characters.mnemonic_image: The capital with remarkable approach - immediate arrival
characters.story: They will arrive AT ONCE — together, as brothers. 'JIU!' the arrival COMMANDS unity. The capital met with remarkable approach — all at once, no one left behind. Brothers together at the end.

characters.mnemonic_image: An enclosure with earth and mouth - the complete circle
characters.story: The CIRCUMFERENCE of the city walls is vast. I SING 'ZHOOOU...' — sustained like the walls themselves. Enclosure complete, earth and mouth contained — the full circle of the capital's embrace.

characters.mnemonic_image: Walking the circumference - time to complete the circle
characters.story: The circumference takes a WEEK to walk. I SING 'ZHOOOU...' — sustained like the days passing. Walking around what surrounds — seven days to trace the capital's full boundary.
characters.narrative_position: The time — a week to circle

characters.mnemonic_image: A scholar-warrior standing - the noble fighter
characters.story: Every SOLDIER is counted. 'SHI!' the roll call COMMANDS response. The figure stands at attention, scholar and warrior combined. Every name recorded, every man acknowledged.

characters.mnemonic_image: A soldier speaking good fortune - blessing pronounced
characters.story: The LUCKY ones will be presented to the Emperor. I GASP 'JI?!' — will I be chosen? The soldier speaks good fortune — mouth carrying luck. To be selected is the greatest honor.

characters.mnemonic_image: A net catching shells - gathering currency for purchase
characters.story: They can finally BUY supplies — real food, clean clothes. I GROAN 'Myyy...' — the weight of finally spending. The net catches shells — money gathered for this moment. After so long, they can purchase comfort.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural relief at purchasing power

characters.mnemonic_image: A soldier over buying - offering what others want
characters.story: Street vendors rush TO SELL them everything. 'MAI!' the merchants COMMAND attention. The soldier stands over the transaction — one who sells serves one who buys. Commerce explodes.
characters.narrative_position: The commerce — vendors rush to sell
